# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

# Solution

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    lines = split(text, " ")
    output = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in lines
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(output, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line *= " " * word
        end
    end
    push!(output, current_line)
    return join(output, "\n")
end
```

# Example

```julia
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")
# Output:
# This function
# will wrap
# words into
# lines
```
